sentences.en: Again there was a great noise at the igloo.
sentences.cn: 雪屋中又是一片极乱的吵杂声.

sentences.en: Bergqvist built his first igloo in 1991 for an art exhibition.
sentences.cn: 博格奎斯特首次建造雪屋于1991年的艺术展览.

sentences.en: Defining the town center of Ramnicu Valcea is a towering shopping mall that looks like a giant glass igloo.
sentences.cn: 沃尔恰市中心的地标性建筑是一座高耸的购物商场，它看上去就像是一座巨型的玻璃圆顶建筑。

sentences.en: Ice Trolls have been observed to live in igloo - like structures and simple tents.
sentences.cn: 冰霜巨魔被认为居住在一种圆顶雪房或是简易帐篷中.

sentences.en: It was even bigger than the igloo of the chief , Klosh - Kwan.
sentences.cn: 它甚至比可络布克旺酋长的雪屋还要大。

sentences.en: Klosh? Kwan led the council to the igloo of Keesh.
sentences.cn: 克 娄 石—克完带着村议会的人来到季奚的雪屋.

sentences.en: One night the village council met in the big igloo of Klosh? Kwan , the chief.
sentences.cn: 一天晚上, 在部落首领 克娄石 —克完的大雪屋里召开了村议会.

sentences.en: Setting a fire for cooking will not melt the igloo.
sentences.cn: 在屋内焚木生火煮食,是不会把他们住的冰屋溶掉的.

sentences.en: So they ended up at the the third Eskimo igloo.
sentences.cn: 因此他们最后来到了第三个爱斯基摩人的家里.

sentences.en: The inside temperatures at the Sorris - niva Igloo Hotel remain between - 4 and - 7 degrees Celsius.
sentences.cn: 这家名为索里斯-尼瓦雪屋酒店的室内温度保持在 -4 到-7摄氏度之间.

sentences.en: The next morning he and Egarter Vigl spruced up the body with a fine spray of sterilized water, which froze on contact. Then they slid the Iceman back into his high-tech igloo and closed the door.
sentences.cn: 第二天早上，他和维格用一种很好的喷雾消毒水通过其冰冻接触清洁了冰人，之后将他滑进他的高科技圆顶建筑，关上门。

sentences.en: The popularity of the igloo is beyond doubt.
sentences.cn: 圆顶屋受欢迎,这一点是毫无疑问的.

sentences.en: When you sign up, you adopt an animated penguin to chat to friends, play games, explore, collect coins and even personalise your very own igloo.
sentences.cn: 当你注册后，你就会领养一直动画企鹅，与朋友聊天，玩游戏，探索，收集硬币，甚至个性化你自己的圆顶冰屋。
